currentFocus.title: Current Focus
currentFocus.description: Architecting scalable web solutions with a focus on data-intensive applications. Leveraging React, TypeScript, and Python to build stable, high-performance systems.
currentFocus.achievement1: Engineered responsive UIs using React & TypeScript, reducing render times and improving type safety.
currentFocus.achievement2: Optimized SQL database schemas and Python pipelines for large-scale AI data preprocessing.
currentFocus.achievement3: Refined JavaScript workflows and resolved complex production bottlenecks to ensure 99.9% platform stability.

education.title: Education
education.mscThesis: Thesis: Evaluating Likert Scales using Machine Learning (Sentiment Analysis).
education.bscThesis: Thesis: Travel Method Detection App using real-time sensor data.

previousExperience.title: Previous Experience
previousExperience.beiningDescription: Worked as an Android Developer building native apps with Kotlin & Jetpack Compose. I utilized the extensive Jetpack library ecosystem to create modern, responsive user interfaces and implemented sensor-based features for better UX.
previousExperience.ksDescription: Managed the company website and admin content. I worked directly with the engineering team to identify and report bugs, serving as the bridge between stakeholders and developers to ensure the platform ran smoothly.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.sentimentDescription: A machine learning pipeline that analyzes customer feedback sentiment with 94% accuracy using BERT transformers.
projects.travelDescription: Android application utilizing GPS and accelerometer data to automatically detect and log travel methods.
projects.portfolioDescription: A high-performance personal portfolio built with Next.js 16, featuring 3D visualizations and a custom bento grid layout.
